page.title: 07Boston Pilgrim Hospital
page.content: Pilgrim Hospital was opened in{1970} for patients to move in and have treatment.It cost over{Â£8 million} pound to build.In the x_ray department there are over a{1000 }patients x_rayed a week.The people who have x_rays come from casualty,inpatients, outpatients,wards and general practitioners.The radiographers mainly x_ray old people but sometimes the very young people.To be a radiographer you must have 5_0levels and 1_Alevel,also have 3 years training. The pilgrim Hospital employs a 1000 staff and it covers 30\ acres of ground.For the x_ray films to developed it takes about 2_4 minutes. The x_ray department have 6 x_ray machines.My mum likes doing her job because she likes meeting people.
